r.s: A continuous test runner for CLI
r.d:
Stagehand_TestRunner is a continuous test runner to run unit tests in CLI.
It makes unit testing in a local environment much easier and comfortable. Additionally it can easily be integrated with a continuous integration server like Jenkins. It has been designed for integration into Integrated Development Environments (IDEs), a developer can create an extension like MakeGood.
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_TestRunner 2.11.1
Two defect fixes
A defect has been fixed that caused the layout of the detailed progress report to be broken by incomplete or skipped tests with data providers. (Issue #136)
And a defect has been fixed that caused wrong number of tests to be output to a JUnit XML if using method/class filters with the real-time option. (Issue #141)
